title: The Darker Side of Money: How to Think Like a Fraudster
description: MarketWatch financial crime reporter Lukas Alpert is joined by Steve Goddard, a fraud prevention expert at anti-money laundering consultancy, Featurespace, to discuss how financial institutions and investors should think like fraudsters to better detect scams and avoid getting ripped off.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
